Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into 1/2-inch thick slices.
Combine soy sauce, lime juice, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil in a bowl.
Marinate tofu in the sauce for at least 15 minutes.
Cut carrots, daikon radish, and cucumber into matchsticks.
Combine mayonnaise and sriracha for the sandwich spread.
Heat a skillet with a little oil and cook tofu slices until crispy.
Cut baguette in half lengthwise and spread with mayonnaise mixture.
